file_content.text: First of all, you'll be severely outnumbered and outgunned.
Every last Skytrooper aboard will rush the breach point. Standard procedure anytime boarders attack a ship in the Eternal Fleet.
How many are we talking about?
"Every last Skytrooper"?
If there's one thing I've proven, it's that I can handle Skytroopers.
I'm not worried.
Can't we trick them somehow?
Then let's fake them out.
Skytroopers' orders come from the ship's captain. She's plugged into every system. They'll know.
SCORPIO's worked out a way for the Gravestone to confuse its outer defenses--overload it with false blips, so we can get in close.
Then it's on us to tear through and get control of the bridge. Take out the GEMINI captain and put the Prime in her place.
She'll take my orders?
The GEMINI series cannot act on its own. Their programming does not allow it.
GEMINI Prime, who do you serve?
I serve the Alliance Commander.
As you should.
Exactly right.
How good are you in a fight?
Is GEMINI Prime combat-ready?
I'm convinced. We could use the extra firepower.
So, Theron, SCORPIO, Senya... Is that our boarding party?
Who else is going?
GEMINI frequency positional data shows no other ships in the area.
You see? We'll be fine--aside from the hopeless odds against our success.
One: you're all insane. Two: we'll be popping out of hyperspace pretty soon.
About time to drop out of hyperspace.
It'll be a nice workout.
You actually want a hundred programmed killers bearing down on you?
Oh, it should be more than that.
Yeah. Moving on...
Somewhere in the triple digits. Possibly more.
I do not share SCORPIO's self-improvement directive, but I mirror her base capabilities in every other way, including full combat protocols.
We can't risk the Prime taking any damage. Leave her here until we secure the ship.
How'd I know you'd say that?
The egos in this place! Think I'd be used to it by now.
I will accompany you. No one is better suited to anticipate our enemy's moves.
I'll be joining you as well. Wouldn't mind letting off some steam.
I'll be watching you closely. Try anything funny, and I turn you into scrap metal.
I still don't trust you.
I still think you're keeping secrets from me.
I don't trust you, SCORPIO.
The GEMINI units are not my allies. They are inferior abominations. Pathetic imitations of a much greater being. Their very existence offends me.
We need all the firepower we can get.
Glad to hear it.
Every last Skytrooper aboard will rush the breach point. Standard procedure anytime boarders attack a ship in the Eternal Fleet.
Every last Skytrooper aboard will rush the breach point. Standard procedure anytime boarders attack a ship in the Eternal Fleet.
I'll be joining you as well. Wouldn't mind letting off some steam.
